div.class: custom_112854 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

span.a: Click here for important information about the Fannin County Mobile Food Pantry

p.span: I appreciate everything you have been doing and everything the community has been doing. The Governor just announced that schools will be closed at least through this school year. I want everyone to understand our compassion to all our students and families during this time. We especially want our Seniors to know how much we love and appreciate them. Keep doing the awesome job you have been doing with instruction and all other details related to our at home learning process. Details will follow soon on what we will be doing for Senior Graduation. If you have any questions please just reach out.

The Governor just extended until May 4th for statewide school closure. It looks like the County is going to a shelter in place tomorrow starting at midnight. We don't have all of the information for the county shutdown yet. They are voting on this tomorrow at three. With all of this in place we are not going to pass out packets Friday. We will be mailing packets out this Friday. Online instruction will stay the same. We will still be serving meals from 9:30 to 11:00 everyday. If you have been receiving a backpack of food, you can get this Friday at meal pickup. Please stay in contact with your teachers. We love and miss all of you. Stay safe.
Thank you for all you do.

div.class: custom_81318 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

div.style: border:none;border-bottom:solid #4F81BD 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 4.0pt 0in;

span.span: Trel Pruitt Commits to Oklahoma Panhandle State!

Trel will be taking his talents to Oklahoma Panhandle State for the 2020 football season. Trel played a major role in the Warriors’ success the past two years. He was the district’s Offensive M.V.P. in 2018 and 2019. He set many records his senior year from the running back position. He has the single game rushing record of 244 yards against Crawford this year. He also scored the most touchdowns in a single game against Whitewright with 5. He totaled over 4400 yards rushing in his career.

What makes Trel so special is his willingness to get better. He excelled in Track the past few years and holds records in the 400 Relay and 800 Relay. He just broke the 200 meter record at the Warrior Relays in March. Congratulations on all your accomplishments from the Warrior Family.
